names.english: clear heat and extinguish wind decoction
names.commonEnglish: Clear Heat and Extinguish Wind Decoction

actions: Clears Heat, resolves Fire toxicity and vents and disperses External Wind-Heat.
With Lian Qiao, for various Heat disorders.
Clears Heat, especially in the Upper Jiao, relieves toxicity and clears Blood Heat.
Expels Wind-Cold and unblocks the nasal passages.
Opens and raises Lung Qi, directing the effects of other herbs to the upper body.
Clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity and transforms Phlegm.
Disperses Wind, clears Heat, stops spasms and extinguishes Liver Wind.
Drains Damp-Heat from the Liver and Gallbladder channels and drains and pacifies Excess Liver Fire.
Disperses Wind, clears Heat calms Liver Yang and extinguishes Wind.
With Chan Tui, for Liver Heat from either Wind-Heat or Liver Yang Rising.
Extinguishes Wind and stops spasms and convulsions.
With Chan Tui, Gou Teng and Ju Hua, for febrile convulsions.
Extinguishes Wind, alleviates spasms, drains Liver Heat and pacifies Liver Yang.
Settles anxiety, calms the Spirit, calms the Liver and anchors and preserves Floating Yang.
Heavily settles and calms the Spirit, calms the Liver, benefits Yin and anchors Floating Yang.
